{"id":1236933064,"question_id":777,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1713568198,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1236933064/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Toeplitz Matrix","memory":"44.4 MB","code":"public class Solution {\n    public boolean isToeplitzMatrix(int[][] matrix) {\n        int m = matrix.length;\n        int n = matrix[0].length;\n        \n        // Iterate through each element starting from the second row and second column\n        for (int i = 1; i < m; i++) {\n            for (int j = 1; j < n; j++) {\n                // Check if the current element is equal to its top-left neighbor\n                if (matrix[i][j] != matrix[i - 1][j - 1]) {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        \n        // All elements match their top-left neighbor, so the matrix is Toeplitz\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"toeplitz-matrix","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
